shows.title: Bogatyri
shows.plot_overview: Ancient Rus. The hero Svyatogor defeated the evil Sorcerer who wanted to conquer Rus - to do this, he used magic to turn into a Dragon. Svyatogor hid three artifacts (the claw, eye, and vein of the Dragon) in the modern world so that evil would never return. But because of the schoolboy Vanya, the Sorcerer's beloved enters our time. She wants to find these artifacts, resurrect the Dragon, and bring her betrothed back to life. Together with two heroes from ancient Rus, Vanya must find the villain

shows.title: A World Gone Mad - The War Diaries of Astrid Lindgren
shows.plot_overview: “Pippi Longstocking“ has been translated into 70 languages and sold more than 60 million copies. The film tells the story of her “mother“, famous Swedish author Astrid Lindgren. When young an still unknown, she starts a diary on September 1, 1939. Full of despair about the world, she is in conversation with herself and discovers the healing power of writing. As WWII ends with millions dead and the destruction of Europe, her first book about rebellious Pippi is published.
